item.title: MMG Warns Peru Election Poses Risk to Las Bambas Copper Mine
item.description: Peru’s presidential election next April could raise the risk of more protests affecting MMG Ltd.’s flagship Las Bambas copper mine, Chief Executive Officer Zhao Jing Ivo said during an earnings call o
